2018–, net/type design.

SB Int’l

SB (sbintl.cc) is my independent type foundry and type design practice. I started it in 2018 with my friend Caleb Woodward as a shared label to release design work under—each of us branding our designs with the SB logo and name. With the release of my typeface sb-spec in January 2020, SB’s focus has shifted towards type design with myself behind the wheel.

New typefaces, along with a refreshed SB website, will be released soon. You can purchase Spec or commission a custom typeface via email—sb@sbintl.cc
